header_text: Your friend is having a get together tonight. You weren't invited, but most of your other friends were. When you think about it, this makes you feel excluded.

elements.Text: Were you not invited because you were busy?

elements.name: Your friend is having a get together tonight. You weren't invited, but most of your other friends were. When you think about it, this makes you feel excluded._Social Situations_comp_question
